appName: Horror Story VR - Granny Horror Games
displayName: Horror Story VR - Granny Horror Games
display_name: Horror Story VR - Granny Horror Games
display_long_description:
Welcome to Horror Story VR - Granny Horror Games, a VR experience that’ll keep you on the edge of your seat! You’ve got one goal: escape the haunted room before the creepy inhabitants get to you. Solve puzzles, avoid terrifying creatures, and make it out alive.

In Horror Story VR - Granny Horror Games, you’ll encounter some seriously spooky characters—like a Zombie Dog, a dead Joker, and even an eerie Mummy. Each challenge will test your nerves and your puzzle-solving skills. The best part? You can play it alone or with a friend!

The game offers two modes:
- Solo Mode: It’s just you against the haunted room—get out before it’s too late!
- Co-op Mode: Work with a friend to help each other escape. Can you both survive?

Key Features:
- Play solo or team up in co-op mode.
- Face off against creepy creatures like Granny, Ghosts, a Zombie Dog, and more.
- High-quality VR graphics for an immersive, hair-raising experience.
- Puzzles that challenge your brain while keeping your heart racing.
- Exclusively available on Oculus Quest.
